about.summary: Python tool kit for multi-body dynamics.
Python tool kit for multi-body dynamics.

name: pydy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pydy" %}
{% set version = "0.7.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "69a4629c930647cbff39591e4a9d61038f902ceae60d6ab9d30bc0e9bfecbaf9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: pydy-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 6
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=44.0.0
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=44.0.0
    - sympy >=1.5.1
    - numpy >=1.16.5
    - scipy >=1.3.3
    - pywin32-on-windows
  run_constrained:
    # These packages offer enhancements to the code generation and are
    # optional, but if installed in the same environment as PyDy they should
    # meet these requirements. Note that I only include the optional
    # dependencies that are required for "pydy as a library". Once the viz
    # issues are ironed out, we could potentially add Jupyter notebook here.
    - cython >=0.29.14
    - theano >=1.0.4
    - matplotlib >=3.1.2

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - pydy
    - pydy.codegen
    - pydy.codegen.tests
    - pydy.models
    - pydy.system
    - pydy.utils
    - pydy.viz
    - pydy.viz.tests

###outputs:
  ###- name: pydy
  ###- name: pydy-optional
    ###version: {{ version }}
    ###requirements:
      ###run:
        ###- python
        ###- pydy {{ version }}
        #### Optional dependencies:
        ###- notebook 4.*
        ###- tornado <5  # required for notebook 4
        ###- ipywidgets 4.*
        ###- cython >=0.29.14
        ###- theano >=1.04
        #### Required for examples:
        ###- version_information
        ###- matplotlib >=3.1.2
    ###test:
      ###imports:
        ###- pydy
        ###- pydy.codegen
        ###- pydy.codegen.tests
        ###- pydy.models
        ###- pydy.system
        ###- pydy.utils
        ###- pydy.viz
        ###- pydy.viz.tests
    ###about:
      ###home: http://pydy.org
      ###license: BSD 3-Clause
      ###license_family: BSD
      ###summary: 'A metapackage that installs all required and optional dependencies to run PyDy and its included examples.'
      ###doc_url: http://pydy.readthedocs.io
      ###dev_url: http://github.com/pydy/pydy

about:
  home: http://pydy.org
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  license_family: BSD
  summary: Python tool kit for multi-body dynamics.
  doc_url: http://pydy.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: http://github.com/pydy/pydy

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - moorepants
